task.summary: Default task
A list if validation errors will be provided to the user if the JSON doesn't match the schema
Uploading a wrong json doc returns the errors in it.
API changes check if document with that ID already exists if not upload if yes dont
API changes Added more patterns to the JSON schema in order to be able to generate correct json file to insert into the DB
API changes Edited the latest JSON schema as it wasn't accepting the correct json files. Should be working now with testJson

API changes Implemented User registration from the API using a json file with a username an password. Also implemented token authorisation. When loging in if the user is given a token that expires in 30 minutes. If the user has the admin property set to true they will be able to execute the API functions if not they wont. This should be modified later on to have more than roles for the users. Also maybe the registration should be done from the WebUI and the Token should be received from the WebUI as well?

API changes Tokens arent generated in the api anymore and authorization takes the encoded token value from the database. Where it was created when a user logged in the Web UI
WebUI changes When registering an Empty token is supplied to the user and when they login for th first time they get a token which is sent to the DB.
WebUI Added Login/Register btns to the header and logout/ username if already logged in
WebUI Still need to figure out how to to pagination for the search results
WebUI Added Email confirmation
Added some TODOs
Added pagination to the search result page of the WebUi
Started work on the advanced search. Working pagination for advanced search. need to figure out how to do AND OR in advanced search
delete some old files
added the search terms on advanced search result page
fixed advance search if empty fields

WebUI
Working on the aesthetics of the page:
added logo to header and advanced search
added various icons
centered forms

API + WebUI
API token is created on user registration and when email is confirmed the privileges are enabled.
added a copy to clipboard button for the API token
will need to write a function to generate new token and then add that button to the account page

API Implemented Flask-Limiter + Redis database for storing the limiter information
WebUI Added a Generate token button to the account page to get new tokens if needed.

API Need to add limits to all API calls, talk with Simon
Added caching with Redis and Flask-Cache Need to add caching the WebUI views and memoize to the API routes+ limits

API Need to add limits to all API calls, talk with Simon
Added caching with Redis and Flask-Cache Need to add caching the WebUI views and memoize to the API routes+ limits
API Fixed routes with param for limiting and caching by adding names for each time the route is called with different params

WebUI Added a list of the last 10 argument documents containing their email to the user page/
Added the email and analyst name as clickbale links on the single_arg page which lead to a list of documents containing that email or name

API
Turned off the expiration for the JWT they now should be valid forever.
